name: BedtimeStories
0:
”Alexa, open Bedtime Stories”
”Alexa, start Bedtime Stories”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bedtime stories
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Fall asleep faster, with Bedtime Stories from Volley.

Join tens of thousands of Alexa owners experiencing better sleep, lower stress, and less anxiety with Bedtime Stories!

Bedtime Stories features 7 free story genres.

FEATURED BEDTIME STORIES
Read by Kate Cocker, host of the "Everyday Positivity" flash briefing on Volley FM (www.volley.fm)
* The Tale of Peter Rabbit by Beatrix Potter
* The Tale of Benjamin Bunny by Beatrix Potter

POPULAR FAIRYTALE AND FICTION STORIES
* Alice in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll
* The Wonderful Wizard of Oz by Frank L. Baum
* Adventures of Pinocchio by Carlo Collodi
* The Little Mermaid by Hans Christian Andersen
* Black Beauty by Anna Sewell
* The Velveteen Rabbit by Margery Williams

HOW TO USE
Get started by saying "Alexa, open Bedtime Stories".
Bedtime Stories will play your selected story until you say "Alexa, stop."
If you stop a story and return to Bedtime Stories, later, you can continue where you left off.

PAID SUBSCRIBER FEATURES
* Unlock hundreds of Bedtime Stories
* Unlock the subscriber-exclusive categories
* New subscriber-exclusive stories are added every month

FEEDBACK AND SUGGESTIONS
If you have questions or feedback, please send an email to support@volleythat.com

Created by Volley - the makers of the hit Alexa games Song Quiz and Yes Sire
